radiographic_examinations.findings: Fascial plane thickening along with minimal bowel wall thickening in the left lower quadrant at the level of the sigmoid colon. Evidence of microperforations with tiny foci of air in this region. Mild dilatation of the proximal small bowel loops without obstruction. Liver, gallbladder, bilateral kidneys, adrenal glands, spleen, pancreas, and stomach within normal limits. No free fluid throughout the abdomen. No mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy by CT size criteria. Remainder of the rectum, bladder, and prostate within normal limits. No free fluid or free air throughout the pelvis.
